examples.example: 每天早上我都会微笑着跟邻居说早上好，开启美好的一天。

translate.english: Every morning I will smile and say good morning to my neighbors to start a beautiful day.

examples.example: 不论晴天还是阴天，我都会开心地对遇到的人说早上好。

translate.english: Whether it is sunny or cloudy, I will happily say good morning to the people I meet.

examples.example: 每天出门前我都会对着镜子开心地说声早上好，给自己加油打气。

translate.english: Every day before going out, I will happily say good morning to the mirror and cheer myself up.
